description: This function replaces a substring from a string, with another string, using a regex expression.

inputs.description: The input string from which to extract the desired values.
inputs.name: string_in

inputs.description: The regex pattern to use to extract the desired value(s) from the input_string. Must have a capture group!
inputs.name: regex_pattern

inputs.description: The string to insert in place of the matched group of the regex pattern. Can be left blank to simply delete the matched text.
inputs.name: string_replace_with

inputs.description:
Flags as a parameter to the python re function. If using multiple flags, then separate them with a comma or | character.

Examples:

re.ASCII
re.IGNORECASE
re.MULTILINE
re.DOTALL
re.VERBOSE
re.LOCALE
inputs.name: regex_flags

outputs.description: The output string, after the regex has made the replacement.
